header: Supreme Court, in anti-CAA blockade case, says there can't be universal policy on right to protest - India News , Firstpost
content: The Supreme Court on Monday said there cannot be a "universal policy" on right to protest and possible curbs as the situation may vary from
summary: Supreme Court says there cannot be a "universal policy" on right to protest and possible curbs. Court says situation may vary from case to case and curbs may be needed. Supreme Court: There can't be a 'universal policy' on right of people to protest.
translated_summary: उच्च न्यायालय का कहना है कि विरोध करने और संभव नियंत्रण करने के लिए सही पर एक "स्ट्रेशनल नीति" नहीं हो सकता है. अदालत कहती है कि स्थिति मामले से अलग हो सकती है और नियंत्रण की ज़रूरत हो सकती है. उच्च न्यायालय: वहाँ एक 'स्टिलल नीति नहीं हो सकती है लोगों के पक्ष में विरोध करने के लिए.

header: RTI reponse reveals over 18 lakh ration cards applications pending in UP; 56.8% requests rejected - India News , Firstpost
content: Lakhs of migrant workers who returned to their hometowns in Uttar Pradesh during the lockdown are eagerly waiting for their ration cards in order to
summary: Migrant workers who returned to their hometowns in Uttar Pradesh during the lockdown are eagerly waiting for their ration cards. Lakhs of migrant workers are awaiting ration cards in order to be able to return to their home state of Uttar Pradesh.

header: Woman accused of sending ricin in letter to White House, arrested on US-Canada border at New York - World News , Firstpost
content: Washington: A woman suspected of sending an envelope containing the poison ricin, which was addressed to White House, has been arrested at the New York-Canada
summary: A woman suspected of sending an envelope containing the poison ricin, which was addressed to White House, has been arrested. She was arrested at the New York-Canada border and is being questioned by police. The envelope contained ricin and was sent to the White House in Washington, DC.
translated_summary: एक महिला का संदेह है कि एक लिफाफा भेजना, जो व्हाइट हाउस को सम्बोधित किया गया था। वह न्यू यॉर्क हाउस में गिरफ्तार कर लिया गया था और पुलिस द्वारा पूछताछ की जा रही है।

header: Two killed, 14 injured in shooting in New York's Rochester; no information on motive and culprit yet, says police - World News , Firstpost
content: Rochester: Gunfire at a backyard party killed two people and wounded 14 others early on Saturday in New York state's Rochester, a city that has
summary: Gunfire at a backyard party killed two people and wounded 14 others early on Saturday in New York state's Rochester. Rochester is a city that has a long history of gun violence. The shooting took place in the early hours of Saturday morning.

header: Tour de France 2020: Two people in custody as probe opened into suspected doping by Arkea-Samsic team - Sports News , Firstpost

summary: French police detained two people on Monday as part of an investigation into suspected doping at this year's Tour de France in the Arkea-Samsic. The two people were detained in Marseille, near the French capital of Marseille.

summary: Basketball icon Michael Jordan announced Monday he has purchased a NASCAR Cup series charter team. Jordan recruited trailblazing black driver Bubba Wallace to race for him. Jordan: "Bubba Wallace is one of the best drivers in the history of the sport"

header: Enola Holmes director Harry Bradbeer opens up on Netflix film, and how a parallel can be drawn to Fleabag - Entertainment News , Firstpost
content: British filmmaker Harry Bradbeer says his film Enola Holmes, about the free-spirited teenage sister of Sherlock Holmes, will resonate with young girls and is firmly
summary: British filmmaker Harry Bradbeer says his film Enola Holmes will resonate with young girls. The film is about the free-spirited teenage sister of Sherlock Holmes. Bradbeer: "Enola Holmes is firmly a film for girls and young girls"
translated_summary: ब्रिटिश फिल्म निर्माता हैरी हैरी हैर कहते हैं कि अपनी फिल्म एनला होम्स युवा लड़कियों के साथ फिर से मरम्मत करेगा. फिल्म Herler होम्स की मुक्त - आत्माहीन किशोर बहन के बारे में है. "नोला होम्स दृढ़ता से लड़कियों और युवा लड़कियों के लिए एक फिल्म है"

header: Emmys 2020 records third straight year of record low viewership with 6.1 mn people tuning in - Entertainment News , Firstpost
content: The novelty of television stars getting Emmy Awards delivered to their homes wasn’t enough to keep the annual show from slipping further in popularity.The Nielsen
summary: Emmy Awards delivered to homes didn't keep the show from slipping further in popularity. The novelty of television stars getting Emmy awards delivered to their homes wasn't enough to keep the annual show from falling further. The Nielsen ratings show that the Emmy Awards have fallen in popularity in recent years.
